P

Pile - Class in project
This class represents a pile: a deck of cards that acts as either Waste or Stock Stock: a pile of cards, face down, to create a draw pile.
Pile(String) - Constructor for class project.Pile
Instantiates a new and empty pile!
play(Game, Card) - Method in class project.Computer
 
play(Game, Card) - Method in class project.Player
Play: this is an abstract method and must be implemented in any derived class.
play(Game, Card) - Method in class project.User
 
Player - Class in project
This class encapsulates a player in a game of crazy eights.
Player(String) - Constructor for class project.Player
Instantiates a new player with an empty hand.
playGame() - Method in class project.Game
Play the game.
popCard() - Method in class project.CardArray
Pop card: remove and return the last card in ArrayList cards.
popCard(int) - Method in class project.Hand
Pop card: removes and returns the card in Hand at the given index.
